rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area and storage space, aligned with the North direction as per Vastu for positive energy.
Open-plan living room integrated with a kitchenette on one side. The main seating area faces East to receive morning sunlight and maintain Vastu balance.
Well-ventilated kitchen with ample natural light. Placed on the South-eastern side for auspicious energy as per Vastu principles.
Master bedroom located in the North-west zone to ensure peace and calmness, with an attached private balcony for fresh air.
Second bedroom positioned in the South-west quadrant. The room is designed to be bright and airy.
Main bathroom located adjacent to Bedroom_1 for convenience with eco-friendly water-saving fixtures.
A compact study room placed near the entrance for easy access, following Vastu guidelines by positioning it in a quiet corner of the house.
Additional storage space integrated within the living area, ensuring clutter is kept away from main living spaces as per Vastu.

openings.description: North-facing entrance that provides a balanced flow of energy into the house.
East and North facing windows in the living area for optimal sunlight and Vastu compliance.
Balcony door providing access to the private balcony, ensuring fresh air circulation and a direct connection with nature.
